target.name: QuickStart
target.text: ICEcore Conference Quick Start Guide

target.name: Sect1
target.text: ICEcore Conference

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Start the ICEcore Conference Client:

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Sign On:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Open your client.

target.name: Step
target.text: Open your client.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Screen Name field, type your screen name or select it from the menu.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Password field, type your password.

target.name: Step
target.text: Optional Settings:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Sign On to log in.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Set Up Your Contact Information:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the main window, select the Options > Edit My Contact Info... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the main window, select the Options > Edit My Contact Info... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Edit your personal information (see the ICEcore Conference Online Help or ICEcore Conference User Guide for detailed descriptions for these fields).

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Add Your Buddies:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contacts and Buddies menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contacts and Buddies menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select one or more contacts from any group under the Community Address Book in the Contact Window (use the CTRL or SHIFT key to select multiple contacts). If you do not see the Community Address Book, your administrator did not give you permission to view it. Instead, use Search to locate potential buddies.

target.name: Step
target.text: Right-click on one of the selected contacts and select the Add to Personal Buddies menu item. (You can view all your Personal Buddies under the Personal Address Book.)

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Add a Non-Community User to Your Personal Buddy List:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contacts and Buddies menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contacts and Buddies menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Right-click on the Personal Address Book and select the Add Buddy By Screen Name... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type the contacts screen name into the dialog and click OK.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Edit a Contact's Information:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contact and Buddies... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Contacts > Manage Contact and Buddies... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Manage Contacts window, select the contact you want to edit.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Edit.

target.name: Step
target.text: Edit the contacts information (see the ICEcore Conference Online Help or ICEcore Conference User Guide for detailed descriptions for these fields).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Start an Instant Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the meeting list, select My Meeting under My Instant Meeting.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the meeting list, select My Meeting under My Instant Meeting.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Start.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add your contacts, see Add Meeting Invitees below.

target.name: Step
target.text: Configure the meeting options (see the ICEcore Conference Online Help or ICEcore Conference User Guide for detailed descriptions of the Meeting Options).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Start Meeting.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Join a Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the meeting you want to join.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the meeting you want to join.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Join.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Create a New Scheduled Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Schedule New. The Meeting Setup window appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Schedule New. The Meeting Setup window appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add your contacts, see Add Meeting Invitees below.

target.name: Step
target.text: Configure the meeting options (see the ICEcore Conference Online Help or ICEcore Conference User Guide for detailed descriptions of the Meeting Options).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Schedule Meeting.

target.name: Step
target.text: If you selected e-mail notifications, a dialog appears for pre-sending meeting invitations:

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Add Meeting Invitees:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the Meeting Setup window, select Show Contacts...

target.name: Step
target.text: From the Meeting Setup window, select Show Contacts...

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Select Contacts window, select the contacts and groups you want to invite to your meeting (use the Ctrl + Shift keys to select multiple contacts and groups).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Invite to Meeting.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Invite Someone Who is Not a Contact:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the Meeting Setup window, select Invite New...

target.name: Step
target.text: From the Meeting Setup window, select Invite New...

target.name: Step
target.text: Fill out the new contacts information (see Editing a Contact's Information).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Start a Scheduled Meeting:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select one of your Scheduled Meetings or a meeting where you are a designated moderator.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select one of your Scheduled Meetings or a meeting where you are a designated moderator.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Start. The Meeting Setup window appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add any additional contacts you want to invite to the meeting.

target.name: Step
target.text: If necessary, edit the meeting options (see the ICEcore Conference Online Help or ICEcore Conference User Guide for detailed descriptions of the Meeting Options).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Start Meeting at the bottom of the window.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Search the Community Meetings:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Find... in the Meetings List window. The Meeting Search window appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Find... in the Meetings List window. The Meeting Search window appears.

target.name: Step
target.text: To save the search, click Save As..., type in a name for your search, and then click OK. (Saved searches appear in the Search Name drop-down list.)

target.name: Step
target.text: Select a Date Range.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Search Criteria for your search (you can select multiple options to narrow your search down). See the ICEcore Conference Online Help or ICEcore Conference User Guide for details on these criteria.

target.name: Step
target.text: To configure the number of results you want to retrieve for this search, type a number into the Number of Results field (default is 100).

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Search Now.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Join a Meeting by Meeting ID or PIN:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select the Meetings > Join by Meeting ID or PIN... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Meetings > Join by Meeting ID or PIN... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type the Meeting ID or PIN number into the field in the Join Meeting dialog. Use the Meeting PIN to join meetings whenever possible so that the meeting server can identify you. You need to use the Meeting PIN to join any meeting where you plan to act as a moderator.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Share Your Desktop or an Application In a Meeting:

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Grant Participants Remote Control:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select one or more participants.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select one or more participants.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Participants > Grant Remote Control menu item to grant the participants remote control rights over your share session ([Remote Ctl] appears next to the participants' names).

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Legal Notice
